wikipedia_page.main: Sir Horace William Alexander Francis CBE FREng (born 31 August 1926) is a British civil engineer.

response: *Civil engineer Sir William Francis lives at Cruckton.Home address given.
* Sir William Francis (civil engineer) (born 1926), British engineer
* William Francis (baseball) (1879–1942), Negro leagues baseball player
* William Francis (rugby union) (1894–1981), New Zealand rugby union footballer

Its flagship developments included the Black Country Spine Road. During its lifetime 11.9m sq.ft. of non-housing development and 3,774 housing units were built. Around 21,440 new jobs were created and some £1,150m of private finance was leveraged in. Circa  of derelict land was reclaimed and  of new road and footpaths put in place.National Audit Office report dated 27 February 2002. The Chairman was Sir William Francis and, subsequently, George Carter and the Chief Executive was David Morgan. It was dissolved in 1998.
